overview: Johnny Nicoletti is an E-Learning executive, New York Times bestselling author of celebrity biographies and actor. He is currently founder and CEO of Hipnoggin, a social network for lifelong learners with a focus on celebrity learning. In 1986, he co-founded and served as CEO of CEIT Systems, Inc., a supplier of authoring and learning management systems. He subsequently was EVP of American Training International, a leading supplier of E-Learning content, and has also served in senior sales management roles for Infotec and NIIT, both IT training companies. He attended Santa Clara University until leaving to found CEIT Systems and later earned a BS degree in Business Management from University of Phoenix.
